Subject: World Cup Cricket
data: 1 Cricket World cup 2015 is jointly hosted by which two countries? A Australia and New Zealand B India and Bangladesh C South Africa and Zimbabwe D Australia and West-Indies Answer: Option [A]
2 Who was the maximum run scorer in cricket world cup 2015? A Virat Kohli B Chris Gayle C Martin Guptil D AB de Villiers Answer: Option [C] Martin Guptil scored 547 runs
3 Which country is the winner of ICC Cricket world cup 2015? A New Zealand B England C India D Australia Answer: Option [D]
4 The number of teams participated in Cricket world cup 2015 is: A 10 B 12 C 13 D 14 Answer: Option [D]
5 Who became the man of the tournament in cricket world cup 2015? A Rohit Sarma B Martin Guptil C Mitchell Starc D Brendon Mcullum Answer: Option [C]

6 The final match of Cricket world cup 2015 was played between which two countries? A Australia and India B New Zealand and India C Australia and New Zealand D India and West-Indies Answer: Option [C]

7 Which two players made double century in cricket world cup 2015? A Virat Kohli and Chris Gayle B Brendon McCollum and AB de Villiers C Martin Guptil and Chris Gayle D AB de Villiers and Dale Steyn Answer: Option [C]
8 Who made the highest individual score in ICC Cricket world cup 2015? A Chris Gayle B Martin Guptil C AB de Villiers D None of these Answer: Option [B]
9 Which of the following players was the brand ambassador of Cricket world cup 2015? A Shane warne B Sachin Tendulkar C Brian Lara D Adam Gilchrist Answer: Option [B]
10 The total number of venues for ICC Cricket world cup 2015 were: A 10 B 14 C 15 D 16 Answer: Option [B]
11 In which ground, the final match of Cricket world cup 2015 was played ? A Melbourne cricket ground B Auckland cricket club C Sydney cricket ground D Wellington cricket ground Answer: Option [A]
12 Who was the captain of team Australia in cricket world cup 2015? A Brad Haddin B Michael Clarke C Mitchell Johnson D George Bailey Answer: Option [B]
13 Who scored the fastest fifty in Cricket world cup 2015? A DA Warner B BRM Taylor C Brendon McCullum D AD Russell Answer: Option [C]
14 Who became the first cricketer to score four successive one day international centuries during world cup 2015? A Virat Kohli B Kumara Sangakkara C Martin Guptil D Hashim Amla Answer: Option [B]
15 Who took the highest number of wickets in ICC Cricket world cup 2015? A Michell Starc B Trent Boult C Both [A] and [B] D None of these Answer: Option [C]
16 Which cricketer(s) took hat-trick in World cup 2015? A Steven Finn B JP Duminy C Both [A] and [B] D None of the above Answer: Option [C]
17 Who was the man of the match in the final match of cricket world cup 2015? A GJ Maxwell B Michael Clarke C James Faulkner D MJ Guptill Answer: Option [C]
18 Who scored the fastest 150 in Cricket world cup 2015? A Chris Gayle B AB de Villiers C Rohit Sarma D Martin Guptill Answer: Option [B]
19 Who was the wicketkeeper of ICC's World cup XI ? A Mahendra Singh Dhoni B Brad Haddin C Kumara Sangakkara D Umar Akmal Answer: Option [C]
20 Who was choosen as the captain of ICC's World cup XI? A Brendon McCullum B Steven Smith C Daniel Vettori D Morne Morkel Answer: Option [A]
21 Which batsman hit the maximum number of sixes in Cricket World cup 2015? A AB de Villiers B Chris Gayle C DA Miller D AD Mathews Answer: Option [B]
22 The highest average score of a batsman in Cricket world cup 2015 is 124.00- who scored this? A Michael Clarke B James Faulkner C Kumara Sangakkara D DA Warner Answer: Option [C]
23 Who scored the maximum number of fours(4's) in Cricket world cup 2015? A Martin Guptill B AB de Villiers C Chris Gayle D Steve Smith Answer: Option [A]
24 188.50 is the highest strike rate of a batsman in ICC Cricket World cup 2015. Who was the batsman? A Mahendra Singh Dhoni B Brendon McCullum C Kumara Sangakkara D Andre Russell Answer: Option [B]
25 Which bowler bowled the best figure 7/33 in World cup cricket 2015? A Mitchell Starc B Tim Southee C Trent Boult D Mitchell Marsh Answer: Option [B]
